General.Name: Isrotel -L
General.Description: Isrotel Ltd. operates and manages a chain of hotels in Israel. It operates operates 21 hotels with various facilities comprising rooms and suites, lobby, dining rooms, restaurants, conference halls, business lounge, pubs, shops, swimming pools, health and fitness clubs, spas, wine bars, movie theaters, etc. The company also provides various vacation facilities. Isrotel Ltd. was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.
